backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and daily fitness entries with access control, storage mixins, and comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend change to replace one login-page image with a new asset.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Preexisting summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in the app’s UI, logic, and data flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions customizing OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with dark mode enabled on the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile-loading flow, theme setup, and routing between login and main layout.
frontend/src/components/AboutView.tsx: Static informational view describing the app’s purpose and features with navigational back button.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsView.ts: Analytics dashboard rendering charts for weight, body fat, measurements, workout duration, and activity frequency using data query hooks.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Renders the main calendar view, tracks selected dates, and opens day detail or photo comparison views with saved-entry indicators.
frontend/src/components/CameraCapture.ts: Provides a camera interface with lens preference, zoom handling, and photo capture, managing errors and device capabilities.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareD: Empty or placeholder file for a date picker modal used in comparison views.
frontend/src/components/compare/CompareS: Header component showing a selected date, its offset from today, and a button to change it with slot-specific styling.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailsInline: Shows a compact summary of a day's stats with variance vs. today, using user unit preferences and existing entry data.
frontend/src/components/DayDetailView.ts: Displays and edits a day's entry including photo, measurements, and workouts, with navigation and camera/upload support.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Defines the app’s top-level layout and navigation between calendar, analytics, profile, and about views.
frontend/src/components/PhotoComparisonV: Displays side‑by‑side photo comparison across three dates with variance indicators and date selection calendars.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal form for creating a new user profile, handling name, gender, and unit selection, then saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileView.tsx: Profile settings page allowing users to view and update profile fields and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, storing identity state, and exposing login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for profiles, entries, and mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus styles for calendar dot indicators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the app.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen with image carousel supporting swipe, mouse drag, and wheel navigation, integrating Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/utils/cameraErrorMapping.ts: Maps browser camera errors to normalized types with user-friendly messages and blocking indicators.
Heuristically selects a standard rear camera lens when possible, avoiding problematic environments like Android Chrome PWAs.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Provides utilities to detect installed PWAs, Android Chrome environments, and their combination.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to backend time, formatting dates, and calculating day variances and offsets.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including feature requests to replace a signup-page gallery image and add a new static asset.
